name: Yomp for Zhi
description: Yomp for Zhi is a difficult turn-based RPG with no getting lost or backtracking. It has perma-death, a lot of randomization, 41 characters to hire, and most enemies can become temporary allies.

name: You Know My Name?
description: A short visual novel about finding your name and a girl in the fog.

name: You Must Retry
description: You Must Retry is a roguelike where you will kill crowds of enemies. Dynamic battles, unique items and abilities. Character upgrading for any style of play. And even death here is not in vain, because after each attempt you will become only stronger.

name: Young Detectives: Animals
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Young Detectives: School
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Young Detectives: Farm
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Young Detectives: Space
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Xiuzhen World 2
description: Xiuzhen World 2 is a 3D world where your goal is to level up from a mere mortal into an immortal at the end. Its a semi-idle game with fun immortal cultivation mechanics such as - leveling up to become stronger. - capturing monsters as pets to fight for you. - AFK(Away From Keybourd).

name: X Roulette
description: Roulette is a 3D Horror-Adult game that revolves around the chilling ritual of taking turns firing a shotgun.

name: X-War
description: X-WAR is a dynamic AAA first-person shooter where players can win in-game prizes through unique mechanics not found in any other game.

name: Yancy
description: YANCY is an NES style action adventure that follows a small protagonist in a vast world full of danger, swords and rewards. Lead your own adventure in a non-linear game world, exploring dungeons, forging magical weapons, battling challenging bosses and unearthing ancient secrets!

name: X Run 3
description: Utilize parkour skills to avoid all obstacles and dangers, and reach the finish line as quickly as possible. With a fragile human body, defy gravity and pursuit, showcase your advanced parkour techniques, and experience the fun and excitement of the sport.

name: YanYueDao Kill
description: This is a simple point-and-click game where you must slay demons at the right moment. Along the way, you can acquire exquisite cards to enhance your combat power.

name: X-Plane 12: FACO Simulations - F-15C Eagle
description: If you think you only fly Airliners and GA: The archaic navigation system of the F-15C will give any pilot a challenge offering a fun way to practice those difficult instrument skills at a much faster pace!

name: X-Plane 12: Axonos - Owen Roberts International Airport
description: Nestled in the Caribbean islands, MWCR Robert Owens International Airport stands tall as one of the busiest airports in the region.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Madrid
description: Sim-wings presents the Airport Madrid with all buildings and service facilities for X-Plane. The aerial image covers a total surface of 400 km², and the detailed 3D models and animations bring the scenery to life.

name: X-Plane 12: Axonos - Varna Airport
description: Varna Airport (Bulgarian: Летище Варна, Romanised: Letishte Varna) is the primary airport for the city of Varna, the historical maritime capital of Bulgaria, now one of the most popular summer tourist destinations in Eastern Europe.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Stuttgart
description: Airport Stuttgart XP brings the international airport of the state capital of Baden-Wuerttemberg as a native add-on to the flight simulator X-Plane 12.

name: Xenospore
description: Defend humanity against a creeping alien fungus in this strategic, turn-based puzzle game. Destroy tiles to isolate the Xenospore organism and protect populations in a minimalistic yet challenging experience.

name: Xenocrystal TD
description: A Rogue-like Tower Defense game with 10 towers, 5 damage types, 20 abilities, and hundreds of upgrades. Select one or more upgrades to your towers and/or abilities at the end of each level that stay with you through your mission to protect the Xenocrystals. Limitless possibilities!

name: Xenowars
description: This is a turn-based strategy/RPG game set in the stars. In the early stages, you will recruit a team of experts on Earth for exploring a distant alien homeworld, choosing between scientists, mutants, and soldiers. Scour the planet for lost alien technology and uncover the secrets to Earth’s doom.

name: Xeroes
description: Xeroes is a fast-paced brawl-action game with charming characters and innovative combat mechanics. Play with friends or solo across a variety of game modes and battle in a variety of familiar and mysterious locations across the world.

name: Wormhole
description: Eat, shoot, dash, and explode your way through the cosmos in this adrenaline-fuelled arcade action game. WORMHOLE is a roguelike twist on the classic snake format featuring a stackable perk system and 100+ hand-crafted levels.

name: Woxin Jianghu
description: A massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG) independently developed by me is also a continuation of a childhood dream, I hope it can make everyone feel happy and communicate with each other! I also hope that all game lovers will give me more advice, and I will try my best to improve...

name: Wrong Bullet
description: Wrong Bullet is a captivating chill shooter that unveils an ever-changing world with random weapons scattered everywhere, accompanying your bloody campaign against enemy heads. Collect golden shards from them to unlock characters, discovering even more facets of gameplay.

name: Nerd Simulator
description: It’s never too late to turn your life around! Step into the shoes of a 40-year-old finally ready to leave the nest in this hilarious RPG-Life Simulation mix. Tackle wacky challenges, embrace absurd adventures, and prove that with determination (and a bit of chaos), you can start fresh at any age.

name: Wukong's Pool
description: Wukong's Pool is a unique fusion of roguelike elements, poker strategy, and the gameplay of billiards. In this pool game, you take on the role of Wukong, the Monkey King, facing a series of challenges.

name: Wyatt Earp and The Cowboys Wargame Ssp
description: Arcade, Arcade! Arcade!! back to the Eighties and the wild west. Stop the Lawmen getting past by shooting them, if they get past they will make arrests. you get three lives to get the highest score you can.

name: X Dash 3D
description: A classic game in which you have to overcome obstacles to reach the yellow point or finish line at the end of the map in a given time in the upper right corner.

name: Xen
description: XEN is a high-octane "Momentum Fighter" with unmatched freedom of movement, where speed itself is your main resource for combat abilities. Wield your Prism Blade and call upon 10 Elemental Natures in order to build speed and defeat your opponents with both sword and spell.

name: World Eternal: Battlegrounds
description: A thrilling blend of MOBA, Battle Royale, and arcade action with an innovative hero and gear collection system. Experience the first open game economy where players can trade items freely on Steam!

name: World Horror Story
description: World Horror Story is a cooperative survival horror game where you need to banish evil before it destroys you. In the game, you can communicate with ghosts and demons using your voice, but be careful; if ghosts respond, it doesn't mean they are friendly.

name: Winter Girl
description: 'Winter Girl' is a visual novel game that begins with a miraculous encounter with the alien, Se-A. Combining modern direction with classic visual novel charm, it offers an immersive story and interactions. Experience various endings based on your choices.

name: Wind Story
description: "Wind Story" is a simulation game, players can immerse themselves in rural lifestyles, including farming, breeding, and fishing. During the day, they can freely roam the Ranch's flower fields, while at night, they can enjoy drinking and dancing by the lakeside bonfire.

name: Wolf Hero: Animals vs. Robots
description: Build a strong pack and protect the forest from evil robots!

name: Wizard Duel
description: Study and cast spells and prove yourself in a duel as the superior wizard.

name: WitchRider
description: This is a building tower defense game with RPG elements to hunt down the demon guard altar.

name: Wisps of the Elements
description: A tactical rogue-lite set in a medieval-fantastic scenery. Defend yourself against your foes, learn the magic of this realm, and discover the deepest secrets of its inhabitants

name: Wire Throne
description: Blast your way out of captivity, upgrade your ride, and unleash devastating firepower to take down the Wire Throne! One life, one car in this roguelite top-down looter shooter!

name: Woodlands National Park
description: Step into the chilling embrace of Woodlands National Park, a first-person survival horror game. As a police officer, team up with friends to find missing bodies and uncover the park's dark mysteries. Armed with weapons and aid from your police car, will you survive?

name: Wonder World
description: This is a real-time strategy game where you can command the Little Glutinous Legion to fight against hostile forces. The characteristics are controlled by genes, and there are trillions of combinations. The game includes three modes, and Little Glutinous welcomes you to their world.

name: Wonder Loop Village
description: You’ve wandered into a mysterious village. Let’s search for anomalies and aim for the exit!

name: WonderLang
description: Embark on an RPG adventure in WonderLang, where mastering a new language is part of the journey. Learn through quests, dialogues, and puzzles. Available in multiple languages with immersive gameplay. Begin your quest for language mastery today!

name: Whispers of The Shadow
description: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

name: Whispering Death
description: Whispering Death is a short horror experience that puts you in a mysterious realm blending in with your past. Solve puzzles and find out who you are. But remember you are always beeing watched, so think through every decission you make before it's too late.

name: While Mom is Away
description: While Mom's Away is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter where you kill players with toasters, pizza and satellite dishes... And also shoot with chips? What kind of goofy game is this?!

name: While Sleeping
description: A first-person horror game dealing with sleep paralysis. You are lying in bed, unable to move, experiencing creepy phenomena and having to survive until morning from ghosts.

name: Who is the Defendant: Deliberately Rough
description: "Who is the Defendant" is a mystery genre visual novel. Players take on the role of a prosecutor, investigating a case involving "a game with rudimentary art published on STEAM."

name: Whisper of the House
description: What's happening in this seemingly peaceful town? Strange residents, bizarre incidents, and unexpected storylines! Please be sure to let go of all your human lifestyle preferences and strive to meet the special requests of your otherworldly employers. Decorate this house with peculiar furniture!

name: The Oracle's Cave
description: You have five days to escape from the Oracle's Cave and gather as much treasure along the way as possible.

name: Why Don't They Laugh?
description: A first-person narrative horror game where you will get dangerously close to the secrets of the Kensington circus dynasty and discover what lies behind their famous shows' scenes.

name: Voxel World
description: A physics sandbox voxel-based simulation game for you to mess with. Build world you can imagine and destroy anything you create.

name: Vorago
description: Welcome to the Oracle-Fields. You are AL-1, a droid tasked with assisting research across space stations on the edge of the galaxy. But now, the 'Time-Event' has changed something. Everyone has disappeared. Locate the others. Face the horrors of space. Solve puzzles. Find your way home.

name: Voodoom
description: Voodoom is a casual asymmetric horror game set in a sprawling, eerie mansion. Team up as voodoo dolls to explore, collect powerups, and seek revenge on the monster that cursed you. Or, lurk in the darkness as the giant monster, ready to strike and eliminate the dolls before they grow too powerful.

name: Wag
description: Survive the Worst Apocalypse Game in WAG, an action-packed open-world survival game. Battle with zombies, fight other survivors, and find refuge in the central church of the city, your last hope in a chaotic world.

name: WaggaSim
description: Take to the skies in the ultimate paragliding and speed-flying simulator. Experience lifelike physics, design or modify your own gear, and perfect your style: soaring, thermaling, acro, freestyle, and more. With soft-body wings that move like real fabric, the sky is no longer the limit!

name: Wait: The Patient
description: Wait: The Patient is a non-combat mystery horror game, that takes place in the 90s and follows the story of Dr. Alice Fincher. After a new patient arrives in the mental hospital she works in, strange events start to unfold.

name: Out of Sight
description: You’re Sophie, a young blind girl who sees through her teddy bear’s eyes. Escape your captors and uncover the evil history of the dark mansion you desperately seek to escape in this unique, atmospheric horror puzzle/adventure game.

name: Cargo
description: Cargo is a space shooter where you collect packages from planets and try to deliver them to other planets without being killed.

name: Untold Tales: A Scarlet Way
description: Immerse yourself in the grim and brutal story of Little Red Riding Hood accompanied by heavy music in the genres of Metal and Dubstep, as you explore a dark fantasy world with Victorian-era architecture and technology

name: Up & Down
description: Up or down? This is the question.

name: Up With Doznik
description: Take Doznik home and fight shapeshifters along the way! A short action adventure game.

name: Urban
description: Urban is a horror game based on the Japanese legend of the 8-foot-tall spirit. Players explore an abandoned village haunted by Hachishaku-sama spirit, surviving encounters to uncover its dark secrets. Can you escape from Hachishaku-sama in Urban?

name: Utility for the Soul
description: A miniature meditative puzzle experience based on the Lithuanian-American environment artist Aleksandra Kasuba’s concept of the Retreat House - a unique, utopian facility used by large corporations to rejuvenate their overworked employees.

name: Blood Sea
description: In this game, you transform into a blue-black bat engaged in a heart-pounding escape from an ancient brown castle.

name: League of Abyss
description: 《League of Abyss》It is a 2D top-down pixel style dungeon Roguelike, where players will play as a hero and defeat terrifying monsters in the abyss, clearing the abyss and saving the world!

name: Trifoil
description: Trifoil is a minimalist, cerebral line drawing puzzle game, that explores how lines can interact with themselves. It has multiple puzzle mechanics, secrets to discover and mysteries to solve.

name: Slime Voyage
description: The platformer where you're broke. Work odd jobs and try not to destroy everything along the way.

name: Keep Going
description: Keep Going is a fast-paced top-down action game! Your goal is to survive for 20 days against endless hordes of monsters, always evolving and testing new skills until you find your favorite combo to defeat the 2 villains of this journey!

name: Blackwoods
description: Alternate history Cold war FPS. Join the Blackwoods unit and unravel a conspiracy which threatens to end your resistance once and for all.

name: Virtual Dream
description: A simple game scene editor Players can place blocks You can customize the position rotation size You can modify the material on the block Can play local videos You can customize the color of the image Custom Sound Map size unlimited one plowing one harvest

name: Kill Kill Kill Kill
description: KILL KILL KILL KILL - Intense arena shooter featuring a space warrior annihilating invaders from the distant cosmos. You're the last line of defense against their domination. Destroy them with diverse weapons, tearing through hordes of enemies.

name: Format
description: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the top scorer in this pixel battle?

name: Black Bird
description: It is a dynamic pixel style shooting game that focuses on fast-paced survival challenges and intense battles against endless zombie waves. The game adopts retro pixel art design, with full color graphics and strong visual impact.

name: Blubber
description: This game is a mechanically-styled flying hazard avoidance game

name: Traffic
description: You have to regulate the traffic by changing the traffic lights from red to green.

name: Homerun Clash 2: Legends Derby
description:
As the sequel to "Homerun Clash," the casual baseball game centered around home run derbies and downloaded 12 million times, "Homerun Clash 2" boasts a rich and diverse range of content, which includes features such as ranking systems that rank players from around the world, 1vs1 Match, 2vs2 Match, the Challenge Derby where the player must play against a pitching machine, and more.

The game also features legendary batters from four different countries where baseball is a popular sport as in-game characters: "Dae-ho Lee" from South Korea, "Albert Pujols" from the United States of America, "Michihiro Ogasawara" from Japan, and "Tai-shan Chang" from Taiwan. Not only do these baseball legends appear as in-game characters, but they are also featured in the story-driven "World Star" content, which has been designed to enhance the gameplay. Already people are quite interested in seeing home run derby matches being played featuring the legendary batters.

name: Incompatible Fusion Machine
description: A scene kid's misadventure
2024 is a homebrew SNES game based on the browser game 2048.

name: One Dreamy Night
description: One Dreamy Night is a traditional RPG game that takes inspiration from Yume Nikki to create a surreal world with oddities at every turn. There's things to find to increase your stats and skill set, along with wacky individuals to encounter. You'll get to the end as long as you look and explore.

name: DreamCatcher
description: A remake of One Dreamy Night as a more straightforward Yume Nikki fangame. Made for Dream Diary Jam 8

name: The Aching Aversion: Blood Orange Dreams
description:
The Aching Aversion: Blood Orange Dreams is a Surreal RPG Maker Horror game about exploring Rahma's disturbing dreams.

Unlike many games of this type, progress in Blood Orange Dreams is earned through killing NPCs in your dreams.

Made for Dream Diary Jam 8, Blood Orange Dreams is the second game from the Aching Aversion series.

name: MuMuMu: Mist of Six Dreams
description: MuMuMu is a traditional Yume Nikki Fangame about exploring dream worlds.

name: Hickory Clock
description: You are Hickory, someone with a pocket watch. To entertain yourself, you may zone out and explore your own thoughts.

name: The Invisible Smoke Factory
description: Surreal point-and-click exploration game inspired by Yume Nikki. 100+ rooms, a few mostly optional puzzles, and minimal text. Meant to be unsettling. No jumpscares.

name: ZDoom Community Map Project II
description: ZDoom Community Map Project: Take II, abbreviated to ZDCMP2, is a single map for ZDoom designed by a large number of mappers. It is one of the largest levels ever made. Like the previous project, each mapper was assigned a set of dates to work on the map, each one continuing where the last mapper finished. It took over two years to build, with a final release on 25 May 2014. The map makes extensive use of ZDoom features, such as 3D floors (including swimmable water), and portals.

name: While (true)
description:
Ina is a young woman that refuses to leave her room. She instead escapes into a dream world of endless possibilities. Play as Ina, and discover the possibilities of infinite dreaming.

Created for the 2024 Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: INTER08JECT
description:
INTER08JECT is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame made with RPG Maker 2003.

Explore the dreams of Tomatsuki, a teenager who really likes tomatoes and cannot get out of their apartment building.

name: Debilitating Dream
description: Debilitating Dream is a Yume Nikki Fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 8. The game is an attempt to create a traditional YN experience with a different style.

name: Somnilithe
description: Multiplayer Yume Nikki inspired game made for Dream Diary Jam 8, featuring characters from Yume Nikki and .flow.

name: The Dreams Of Fritz
description:
Count to three, walk into your deepest dreams. The visions await.
Made for DDJ8, explore a dark dreamscape and perhaps you'll start to uncover what exactly went wrong.

name: Dreaming Network
description:
A traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you play as a robot stuck in an abandoned facility, left to wander through digital worlds.

Created for Dream Diary Jam 8

name: Layered
description: layered is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Gatatsuki and Gakutsuki, who must collect Qualia, this game's version of effects.

name: Dota DS
description: Dota DS is an unofficial homebrew demake of the Warcraft III custom map "Defense of the Ancients" for DS.

name: Hangar 8
description:
Hangar 8 is a psychological horror set within the unsettling confines of a derelict space station. Brave the looping corridors, spot all ?? anomalies, collect key items, and escape the nightmare!

Blending anomaly spotting mechanics from games such as "The Exit 8" and "I'm on Observation Duty", with the liminal-space psychological horror of "The Backrooms", HANGAR 8 challenges both your memory and your sanity.

name: Perfect Pixel Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Dungeon Easy
description: Sin descripción

name: Skillful Pixel Dungeon
description:
Skillful is a rogue like game with skills
A roguelike RPG game with 4 classes, 25 levels and 5 unique bosses.
Each class has 6 unique passive skills and 3 unique active skills.
Fight your way through the dungeon and defeat mobs and their champions. Use a wide variety of weapons, armor, wands and potions.
Capture the essence of mobs and use them as servants!
More than 40 skills, 4 classes, 4 types of champions and 5 types of mercenaries.
Play the campaign and follow a unique story line.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
description: An in-flight entertainment video game adaptation based on the popular TV series Who Wants To Be A Millionaire.

name: Capybara Fighters!
description: Capybara Fighters! is a 2D/3D hybrid beat-em up set in modern Tokyo. You play as the star capybara of a cafe, whose life is disrupted when the Yakuza abduct your friend. To rescue them, you'll battle through enemies, earn money, and ultimately secure a plane ticket to Brazil for the final battle.

name: Not A Banana: Capybara
description: Hello! Welcome to the wonderful world of capybara clicker! Here you will become a true friend of the capybaras, clicking on the screen and calling the cutest and sometimes special capybaras! Don't forget to keep clicking to attract even more capybaras to you!

name: Capybara
description: An idle game about Capybaras! You click in a capybara to increase your herd of capybaras! Every 3 and 24 hours, you get dropped a Skin. Collect all of them!

name: Capybara
description: "Capybara" is the perfect game for anyone who loves relaxing yet captivating clicker games. With its adorable mascot and endless opportunities for growth, this game will entertain you for hours. Download "Capybara" now and start your adventure!

name: Megatramp: A Success Story
description:
An extreme tramp simulator!
Live the life of a tramp – survive, save money and try to rise above the crowd!
Life is cruel and only the most stubborn can survive life on the streets. Fight for your life – stay healthy, keep up your spirits and don't go hungry, otherwise you'll lose everything!

name: Western Death
description:
About the game

Western Death - is a 2D roguelike game with RPG and fantasy elements.

name: SMOD: Outbreak
description:
I have been laid down in a pit of darknesses and the shadow of death. And thy anger has pressed down upon me; and all thy cares have come down upon me. And from this bed I cry out for the kindling of thy Light!

Outbreak might be best summed up as an add-on to the original SMOD that encourages the same frenzied action as it throws a generous number of hostiles at the player, especially zombies. Following its base, Outbreak's arsenal includes usual suspects like the G36 carbine, as well as less conventional ones such as a katana that gives the player a speed boost.

Outbreak started off in Summer 2007 as a small, personal mod by SMOD: Tactical forum member veteran_gamer. His hobby project was later released and was well received. As time went on, others like Useful, Jen4, and IneptGuard contributed work and ideas as well.

name: SMOD Troopers
description: Sin descripción

name: Jamango!
description: Jamango! is a new gaming platform that enables anyone to create, and play user-generated worlds. Our mission is to unlock imagination, and empower the next generation of game creators.

name: Opossession
description:
Humanity has reached unparalleled heights of advancement, traversing the vast expanses of space and establishing settlements across the cosmos. With a staggering population of 400 quadrillion souls, our species has become ubiquitous throughout the universe. This era of evolution has heralded the emergence of novel technologies and occupations, among them the enigmatic profession of Mailmans.
These individuals navigate the expanse of the cosmos aboard spaceships reminiscent of delivery boxes, ferrying parcels and missives across the boundless reaches of space. Yet, amidst this sea of interstellar couriers, there exists a singular figure who stands apart.
A Mailman unlike any other, accompanied not by mere machinery, but by an unconventional companion—a pet opossum named BOB.

name: Escape Capyland
description:
An amazing, yet depressing place where your goal is to survive the night! You are stuck in your office till 6 AM, and all you can do is 'keep them away'.

Good luck in your shift!

name: Tamagotchi Connection
description: The Tamagotchi Connection is a virtual pet released by Bandai Namco Toys & Collectables on July 10, 2024. It is a relaunch of the Tamagotchi Connection line made to celebrate its 20th anniversary. It was first teased on April 25, 2024, before officially being revealed on May 13, 2024. The device contains a hybrid of features from both the Tamagotchi Connection Version 3 and the Keitai Kaitsuu Tamagotchi Plus.

name: The PTSD Mod
description:
The PTSD mod, It's weird. It's dumb, it's a guy who has an obsession with old punt and outdated memes.

PTSD mod let's you see the world from PTSD guy's eyes, experience memories, nightmares, memes and all sorts of stuff in this crazy world full of ptsd. Fight back the new punt leader and win back old punt!

name: The PTSD Mod 2
description: PTSD guy returns in this all new adventure, full with completely new levels, secrets, weapons and returning characters Experience weirdness to it's full extent, and maybe even discover something more sinister/serious in it all...

name: PTCS: A Post Traumatic Christmas Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Whale Well
description: Whale Well is a short adventure game where you play as a duck. Collect and trade items while exploring a civilization in the belly of a great whale.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Pilgrim Pack
description: Deep in the Lands of the Old Faith lies paradise, for any pilgrims brave enough to seek it…

name: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence
description: Final Fantasy XI: The Voracious Resurgence is an episodic story series update to Final Fantasy XI that began release in 2020. Like add-ons previously released for the game, the story series is introduced as part of a regular version updates. Unlike those add-ons, The Voracious Resurgence does not require an additional purchase to access.

name: The Sky Climber
description: The Sky Climber is a fun and small game where you have to run towards the top of the building by wrecking and exploding anything in your way! Avoid falling to the bottom of the construction site!

name: Plumo At The Zoo
description: Sin descripción

name: MetroRunner
description: in a post apocalyptic world where the inhabitants of bucharest have moved in the metrosystem you set out on a journey to escape to the surface

name: Plumo On The Farm
description: Series of learning activities, using a range of multimedia tools, help children develop basic cognitive skills (observing, classifying, finding relationships, etc.) through play

name: Deltarune - Spamton Restitched
description: a fan-made sequel to the Spamton Neo fight.

name: Dragon Kingdom
description: Explore math skills as you battle sinister storm clouds with dragons Luna and Ash!

name: Summit
description:
Summit is an exhilarating mountain climbing game that requires precision platforming. Players embark on an epic journey to conquer the mountain by overcoming puzzle platforming obstacles and mastering climbing techniques.

With over 70 puzzle rooms to navigate, Summit offers precision platforming at its best. Equipped with 2 pickaxes, scale the mountain to reach the top. Avoid physics based environmental hazards as you uncover the story behind our protagonist’s unwavering tenacity to reach the top.

Will you reach the summit?

name: Tug Team Tractor Multiplication
description: It's time for a game of tug-of-war with tractors. Tug Team Tractor Multiplication is a free math game for kids. Teams play together to pull the other team across the line. Each correct answer gives the team a tug. The team that pulls the other team over the line wins!

name: Aquaball
description: Experience a magnificent underwater world of sunken ships and pirate booty in Aquaball, a visually stimulating and addictive new Arkanoid adventure. As you dive into 140 exotic levels, you'll be challenged to keep one or more balls in play as you shatter brilliantly animated seashells, hit daggers that slice across the screen and enter portals that transport your ball into protected treasure troves.

name: Mobfish Hunter
description: Set in the year 2020, after the greedy Autocracy has stripped the world of rare Earth elements, disastrous pollution has wreaked havoc on our once-beautiful oceans. Now the world’s fish have mutated into dangerous new species known as Mobfish. To combat these vicious critters, a new class of Mobfish Hunters emerged – and it’s up to you to rise through their ranks. Trick-out your fishing lures with a variety of projectile and melee weapons to rid the seas of Mobfish and become a champion Hunter.

name: The Dragon's Intern
description: The Dragon’s Intern is a 2D Adventure Exploration game about an intern- I mean apprentice - who works for a dragon that is hiding under the roads of a city. The boss keeps you busy and each night teaches you about potion making. However, as an apprentice of an underground dragon… you don’t make a lot of money, and have to pay rent in 5 days… Make potions, solve puzzles, and commit petty crimes in order to reach the goal of Not Being Evicted and becoming a Real Wizard.

name: Crime City
description: Want to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals? Become the toughest Mob Boss in Crime City! Rise through the ranks of the mafia and take over the city! Build up your hood, do jobs, and fight other players!

name: Brain Out: Can You Pass It?
description: “Brain Out” is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers and different riddles testing challenge your mind. It evaluates your logical think ability, reflexes, accuracy, memory and creativity. Do not answer the quests in the ordinary way if you don’t want to be tricked. The solution subverts normal thinking is the most interesting thing in this trivia game. We bring you a different game experience with creative thinking and absurd solution.

name: Brick Breaker DEMOLITION
description:
Destroy all the bricks to pass phase and enjoy the spectacular visual effects in this clone of the famous game Bricks Break were so popular in the 70's and 80's and that you can carry in your pocket everywhere.

There are two control modes ball: Classic, where the bounce angle depends on the point of impact on the racket (steeper as more far from the center) and Demolition, where the bounce angle depends on the angle of incidence and the movement of the racket.

DEMOLITION currently consists of 800 levels but will be adding more. To overcome them you will have various aids, although sometimes they can hinder you work, as can be changes in the size of the racket or the speed of the balls multiplier balls, barrier, fireballs, gravity, change visibility bricks ...

You also have a limited number of wildcards or 'jokers' to skip levels that can not be able to complete.

name: Dungeon Madness
description:
A wizard has hidden in these dungeons. He is plotting to conquer the world and the only way how to stop him is to kill him! But don't think it will be easy, many before have tried without luck. (From what else would all those skeletons be made of? Polycarbonate?)

Explore gigantic dungeon to find new epic items, new equipment, learn powerful spells and fight all kinds of different monsters. Are you afraid of dark? Don't worry, because a ghost residing in doors will become your best friend. Or not. Who knows?

name: Grapple Up!
description: Grapple Up is a game inspired by other one-level, unforgiving platformers such as Only Up, Chained Together, Getting Over It and Sisyphus, but with a grappling hook! Who doesn't love a grappling hook?

name: JellyKing : Rule The World
description: The wacky little Jelly starts his adventure! Help him bouncing and Rule The World! It's all up to your hands and brain.

name: Puzzle Fuzzle
description:
Sometimes it’s as easy as one and one makes two.
Unlock your inner MacGuyver and your inner Picasso and even your inner engineer as you solve puzzles by disassembling pictures and using the pieces to create a brand new object. Dr Frankenstein is the master of piecing together random parts, but you can do it without all the extra time spent getting a fancy degree. Start creating your mixed-up masterpieces right away!
There are hidden components in each image, your imagination is all you need to combine the correct shapes in the proper way.
Use a suitcase and a mitten to build a toaster.
Find a wine glass in a plunger and a candle.
Your brain is your best tool to see the pieces tucked into each object as you tear apart two distinct images and use the correct parts to make beautiful new pictures.

name: Animal Farmland
description: A casual simulation management idle game. Players can click to place crops and buildings, earn coins, unlock a wealth of animals and buildings, and expand the farm

name: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny
description: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny is a turn-based strategy simulation game, the opening has four different characteristics of the monarch representing 4 countries for players to choose, there are as many as 100 controllable generals, rich transfer system and rich skills of generals,

name: Kaimeishi
description: Sin descripción

name: Zone 13
description: Find anomalies, escape the endless loop, and uncover dark secrets of Zone 13.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Brazil
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Brazil landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: A Beaver's Tale
description: A cozy, adventure, builder game. Live out the life of Buckey the Beaver: go swimming in the river, build dams, and find treasures! In story mode, learn to protect your beaver kits and become a master builder. Fully customize this colorful and cozy world in builder mode.

name: Abomin-Agency!
description: Abomin-Agency! is a party game for 3 to 8 players. Players compete to design the 'best monster for the job' for the clients of Dr. Frankenstein's Super Fantastical Monster Factory. Design & pitch your creation to your fellow players to win the big pay day!

name: Abrasion
description: Abrasion is a short exploration-focused horror game set inside an ancient megastructure.

name: A Bumpy Ride
description: Take a jaunt into the world of A Bumpy Ride, a casual train-driving and exploration game! Inspired by railroading of the 19th century with a whimsical spin, you'll adventure around the open frontier in your trusty little train, picking up passengers and freight.

name: Abysmal Gateway
description: Abysmal Gateway is an Open World Dark Fantasy action-RPG with fast-paced combat. Venture into the depths and the forsaken realms of the abyss. Will you emerge victorious, or be consumed by the darkness? This journey is not for the faint of heart!

name: AbyssalRestaurant
description: You will play as a tavern owner in a fantasy world, entertaining guests, shopping at the market, cooking yourself, fully customizing your own delicious (and possibly peculiar) recipes, and promoting your shop and dishes to more friends~ (with lots of physics in the game)

name: Abyss Looters
description: Abyss Looters is a cooperative extraction dungeon crawler game, for 1-4 players. Explore Abyss dungeons with friends, avoid traps and dangerous monsters, collect artifacts, build your own adventure guild!

name: ABYA: Paint Ball
description: ABYA: Paint Ball is a challenging 2D platform action-shooter game. The robot ABYA awakens from a dormant pod, following the guidance of AI, wielding a specialized water gun to explore the complex and hazardous underworld for resources, enhance equipment, and open the central elevator.

name: Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels
description: Become a coach for the tennis club in a prestigious sports academy with all members being hot chicks, but they all hate you. What to do now? Conquer them all, of course!!! Prepare yourself for heated tennis matches with dynamic gameplay and powerful abilities. Prove your skills and win their hearts.

name: Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels EX
description: Become the coach of a prestigious sports academy's tennis club, filled with stunning girls who all dislike you. How will you handle it? Win them over, of course! Prepare for intense tennis matches with dynamic gameplay and powerful abilities. Prove your skills and earn their bodies.

name: Access: EnTree
description: A social-sim RPG where players develop a small town to make it more accessible and inclusive for residents with disabilities. With elements of community building, strategy, and interactive storytelling, players learn to make decisions that affect the game world and its inhabitants!

name: Accident Liquidator
description: Accident Liquidator is an exciting 3D arcade action-adventure game that throws you into situations where each day presents new challenges necessary for survival.

name: ACP: Action Coin Pusher
description: An Action-Roguelite where you fire coins at evil statues that hurt you if they fall off the bottom of the board. Complete Challenges, unlock classes, perks, and equipment for your runs. Earn Gems in runs to buy permanent upgrades and unlocks. Can you survive 'til the end?

name: Megis Adventure
description: "Megis Adventure" is a role - playing, open world pixel game. You find yourself on an isolated, faraway island and starts an adventure to overcome quests, dungeons, monsters and foes – all in hope to help the residents of "Megis Island"

name: A Good Cat and The Graduate Life
description: Playing as a good cat, helping your master get over the struggle!

name: Age of Enchantment
description: Age of Enchantment is a tower defense deck-builder set in a classical Fantasy world. Build, upgrade, and enchant your towers with a variety of buffs while adding cards to your deck. Do you have what it takes to thwart the rising Evil?

name: A Furry Tale: A night in Havena
description: A Furry Tale - A night in Havena is an action-adventure set in the medieval fantasy world of Aventuria in which you lead two feline protagonists Karanor the warrior and Mewrio the rogue throughout an adventure-packed night in the dark underbelly of the harbor city Havena.

name: AI Schoolgirls Murder Mystery
description: Investigate a teacher's mysterious death in a rural high school by questioning AI-driven suspects, Sora and Miyagi. Gather clues, analyze alibis, and solve the case before the official investigators arrive. Can you find the real killer?

name: Airflow
description: Coordinate max flow rate while maintaining separation between aircraft in this air traffic control simulator.

name: Aim Camp
description: Aim Camp is the new tool to improve your aiming and precision skills. It combines military simulation with the fun of gaming. Face intense challenges with realistic graphics and comprehensive training, including CQB, sniping, and drones. Get ready to dominate every shooter game!

name: A Horror Game for Cowards
description: It's a short horror game designed for those who are too scared to play horror games and for horror lovers looking for different experiences. The game features cartoon-style graphics, a narrator and popular horror elements in a safe experience. It also includes Easter eggs and 2 different endings.

name: Akaneiro ni Somaru Saka
description: Nagase Junichi's life takes an unexpected turn when his fiancée, Katagiri Yuuhi transfers to his school but what would be a happy reunion crumbles due to a misunderstanding. Will this be an end to Junichi's formally peaceful, school life?

name: Alaric
description: Boomershooter meets Metroidvania. Fight like hell and defeat the evil king. Explore a giant castle full of secrets.

name: Albert's Ark Idle
description: Albert’s Ark is a 2D clicker/idle game where you upgrade buildings, play mini-games, make money, sail the seven seas, and revive fantastic mythical creatures to bring magic to the kingdom.

name: Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+
description: "Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+" is a puzzle game in which the player needs to collect images of girls by rotating the puzzle pieces, while watching beautiful girls in parallel.

name: Puzzle Masters
description: In our jigsaw puzzle game, the image is shuffled into fragments. Players observe each fragment's shape and color, placing them correctly. The game offers multiple difficulty levels for various skill levels.

name: Puzzle Scenery
description: This game is a classic memory game with multiple difficulty levels and beautiful graphics. In the game you have to go through 20 levels consisting of pictures of nature.

name: PuzzleScriptMis
description: Tool for creating puzzles interactively.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Gamer Girl
description: Solve the puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a naughty gamer girl in front of her gaming computer, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Runes: Hidden Objects Puzzle Game
description: Step into the enchanting realm of Enchanted Crossroads, a fantasy town bustling with a myriad of captivating creatures and hidden artifacts to be unraveled.

name: SVG-001 Puzzle
description: Classic jigsaw puzzle with beautiful visuals, waiting for you to piece it together.

name: Touhou Picross: Nazrin's Puzzles
description: Help Nazrin solve the incident of the mysterious puzzle craze spreading throughout Gensokyo!

name: Super Puzzle Blasters
description: With over 45 unique puzzle levels to solve in adventure mode plus local multiplayer for up to 4 people acrross 2 modes and 10 arenas there is a lot to discover in this seamingly pocket sized puzzle game!

name: Nao's Love Triangle: Hentai Puzzle 18+
description: «Nao’s Love Triangle: Hentai Puzzle 18+» is a puzzle game in which the player has to collect images of girls by rotating the puzzle pieces, in parallel following the relationships of the three heroines.

name: Orbit Puzzle
description: "Orbit Puzzle" is a puzzle game that lets you unravel the mysteries of ancient astronomy! Analyze the complex orbit of a given celestial body and accurately determine the rotational speed and radius of both the deferent and epicycle. Understand the geometric principles of epicycles and complete the path of the celestial body. Each level presents more challenging orbits, testing your logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Embark on an exciting journey to uncover the secrets of the universe from the perspective of an ancient astronomer!

name: Pixel Puzzles 3: Ukiyo-e Jigsaws
description: Pixel Puzzles, the very best in the world of digital jigsaws.

name: Prison Puzzle
description: Prison Puzzle is a single-player escape game set in a mysterious prison. Solve intricate puzzles to find the only way out. With an engaging storyline, challenging puzzles, and a suspenseful atmosphere, it offers a unique gaming experience as you navigate your escape as a test subject.

name: Cube Railway
description: Cube Railway is a puzzle game where players must strategically fit blocks to complete a railway track and set the train in motion. Reach the next level by correctly placing the cubes within the designated spots on the track.

name: Erotic Dream Puzzle
description: Erotic Dream Puzzle is a casual swap-puzzle game with relaxing music and gameplay.

name: Fantasy Puzzle King
description: ‘Fantasy Puzzle King’ is a casual strategy puzzle game that combines turn-based elements.It is a simple stage-conquering game that uses only mouse clicks. Discover 12 unique skills and 12 stages.

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: Spooky Town
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds eight new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Hidden Cats in Spooky Town!

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: New York
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds seven new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Hidden Cats in New York!

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: London
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds seven new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Hidden Cats in London!

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: Berlin
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds eight new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Hidden Cats in Berlin!

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: Rome
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds eight new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Hidden Cats in Rome!

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle: Santa's Realm
description: A Jigsaw Puzzle expansion that adds eight new scenes to the base game. Those come directly from our hidden object game, Santa's Realm!

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Canvas of Time
description: Step into the past with Canvas of Time, where every puzzle holds a piece of the history. Enjoy 39 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Dreamy Depths
description: Unique Puzzles Not Found Anywhere Else. These 33 detailed stained Underwater Landscapes will immerse you in a world where the intricate beauty of Dreamy Depths comes to life.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzle: Welcome to Slumberland
description: Discover the beauty, mystery, and magic. With 42 pictures, immerse yourself in the whimsical and fantastical world of Slumberland. Are you ready to enter the world of dreams? Start your adventure today and let your imagination soar.

name: Peacequarium
description: An idle aquarium simulator you can resize and keep anywhere on your screen while you do other things. Buy, feed, and grow your fish to earn money. Buy cool upgrades and complete your collection of rare, epic and legendary fish!

name: Sailing Alone: Aftermath
description: Sailing alone: Aftermath is a post-apocalyptic nautical survival game where players navigate their ships through an infinitely vast open world, exploring endless oceans and lands, playing any role you desire, and penning their own legendary tale of survival in the apocalypse.

name: Femdom Game World: Stacy
description: Femdom Game World: Stacy is a visual novel with a deep plot, designed for an adult audience. Finding yourself in the role of a student, you will have to win a bet: to seduce your pretty teacher. But who would have thought that the young teacher will turn out to be a strict and ruthless Mistress?

name: Dino Market
description: Animal friends to keep you company while you work on other tasks. Run a cozy market, play with your chat during streams or use productivity tools to help you focus. All from your desktop!

name: Sunset Arena
description: Take on Friends in a Synthwave inspired arena where the only control you need is a joystick. Every controller can support 2 players. Play against a friend with a single controller! Supports up to 8 players. Customize, Powerup, and Derezz your way to victory!

name: Derpy's Fun House
description: This is a very short Point and Click Adventure where you try to find Items for Anon because he is the strongest who can help opening the Door to the outside

name: Lacrimal Eye
description: This game plunges you into an epic tower defense campaign

name: Slate
description: This game takes you into a colorful cartoon town.

name: Elevate
description: ELEVATE is an ever-changing island full of off-road driving competitive events! Rising to the top of the leaderboard will put your name in the game! Welcome to the weekly challenge... Welcome to ELEVATE.

name: Roads Construction Sim
description: Prepare to master the art of road construction in this highly immersive and realistic simulation game.

name: Prove It and Move It
description: You claim you're a gamer... that you have skill... well why don't you prove it then? Here. Here's more than 300 chances to prove you're the real deal. All you gotta do is not get hit by anything.

name: Chimera
description: Play as the mythological Chimera in this action-packed rogue-lite. Make your escape from a deadly tower filled with unrelenting enemies as you uncover its dark secrets. Enter this fantasy world and overcome intense challenges, find hidden lore, and discover the true reason behind your imprisonment.

name: Hentai Akari
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: FireStarter 2
description: FireStarter 2 is a simplified forest fire simulation game that offers a first approach to fire science for all.

name: Hentai Tales: Strange Land Apaku
description: There is a place called Apaku. In this strange land, people worship stockings as if they were sacred items. You have always been interested in stockings and is intrigued by this mysterious place. You decided to visit Apaku for himself, hoping to learn more about it. What will happen there?

name: Under the Blue Horizon
description: "Under the Blue Horizon" is an idle simulation game. Play while performing other tasks on your computer! Place your own aquarium anywhere on your screen, coexisting with your work, games, and more!

name: The Out Door
description: You wake up in a closed room. To escape, you need to choose the correct door 100 times in a row. Solve the puzzles, attract luck, and clear the challenges. Intelligence, reflexes, accuracy, insight, and gaming skills—everything will be tested.

name: The King Cat Clicker
description: In this game, you accumulate an absurd amount of coins and help the King of Cats to renovate his kingdom to earn even more coins.

name: Senseless
description: Cursed to lose your mind during a planetary exploration, You only have your wits to help you through the perils of you own psyche. Playing as Jorvin the rat, with mechanics similar to "Prince of Persia", defeat your demons and find peace with yourself.

name: Homeless
description: Beneath the dazzling lights of New York, a sinister darkness lurks. In the hour when the whole city is sleeping, a strange and terrifying man emerges from the darkness, intent on shattering your mind and spirit

name: Popcorn!
description: A satisfying clicker where you pop and eat popcorn, discovering secrets along the way! Compete for high scores in time trial mode, or just pop and chill in classic mode.

name: DeathGearX
description: A thrilling online PVP battle game! Experience the Ultimate Mech and Tank Battles! Create unique mechs, tanks, and armed jeeps, and master diverse weapons with distinct advantages.

name: Outpost 3
description: this is a mining , got resources to upgrade device and weapons game,monsters will appear and defence your mecha . player landed on different planets,them can collect diffient ore and upgrade weapons,find mining device and relics to make every round special . move character and mining ore

name: Sunrise Down
description: A collection of unique and engaging puzzles. Guided by your host, Antisthenes, you'll not only solve puzzles but also delve into intriguing philosophical discussions.

name: A Smoker's Story
description: A short immersive VR experience.

name: Strawberry Park
description: A recent disappearance at Strawberry Park, where no one knows what happened, may have a connection to urban legend. Your name is Ruby, and you go to Strawberry Park to investigate at night...

name: Square of Joy
description: Climb up, reach the top, using nothing but your skill and will. Compete with steam friends and players from all over the world. Discover secrets along the way.

name: Forgotten Fears
description: Forgotten Fears is a collection of five small horror games, ranging from rainy forest to deep underwater.

name: Spectralia
description: Spectralia is a free-to-play clicker game with collectible items that you can delete, trade, exchange, open from a container or get by daily entering the game. There is a chances of getting tradable agent every 24 hours.

name: DevilConnection
description: Punish the little bastard demon and being punished too! Cemo-Summoning Adventure Game

name: Spiritgrapher: The Asylum 99
description: A retroy style first-person horror adventure set in an abandoned hospital. You are a spiritgrapher, your camera can see what is beyond the reach of the human eye. Head to an abandoned hospital and shoot a report about supernatural events.

name: Hope
description: HOPE is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players set in the 1930s. Perform exorcisms, explore dark locations, and use voice commands to survive demons in terrifying scenarios.

name: Demon Lord: Clicker
description: A Steam-Drop Clicker with real game mechanics in a high fantasy setting. Click for drops, then choose to combine them for stronger/rarer variants, equip them for power! Amass wealth and glory! Be the hero, assault the Demon Lord! (No fruit is harmed during gameplay)

name: The Labyrinth
description: Race friends in trap-filled mazes. Reach the gold chest first in 'The Labyrinth' – Can you escape?

name: Space Game
description: In a vast universe where nothing is familiar, you must use your knowledge to progress and learn how to survive. Upgrade your spaceship and explore to your heart's content, or destroy everything that comes your way, all in classic retro style.

name: Furry Adventure Club and the Holy Grail
description: Brave Furry heroes in Furry Adventure Club and the Holy Grail as they embark on an epic quest to find the legendary Golden Grail. Solve a variety of puzzles and explore mysterious locations

name: Single Espresso
description: Single Espresso is a single-player, cafe shop management game. Accompany Jade's journey, and help her to overcome obstacles in her new adventure of the mini coffee shop business.

name: The Rookery
description: All the strategic depth of chess with all the fun of roguelikes! Upgrade your army with boosts, relics, and consumables to take on formidable bosses - without all the tools at your disposal, you won't stand a chance!

name: Dynasty's Defender: The Scroll's Curse
description: Dynasty's Defender: The Scroll's Curse is a strategic bubble shooter game set in the Western Han Dynasty. Players assume the role of a great general battling a magic scroll-wielding assassin. Precision shooting will burst all magical bubbles to rescue the emperor and empress.

name: Rogue Climber
description: You've only got a short time to climb. An army of enemies and traps are waiting to stop you. Manage your equipment, hone your build, and master your platforming techniques to climb higher than anyone before you.You think you've got what it takes? I don't think so.

name: Rogue Rhythm
description: A roguelike with rhythm-game combat and procedural dungeons

name: Ironsand
description: Ironsand is a hardcore rogue-lite FPS. Your team lands on a desert planet full of various enemies. You are given 10 attempts to capture each of the cities and destroy desert monsters, cyborgs and the main goal - the huge Titan combat robots

name: Infiniwar
description: Infiniwar is a stylized modern military real-time tactics game inspired by classics in the genre. Command your units in epic battles, call in artillery and air strikes. Upgrade your forces with ARPG-inspired progression systems. Conquer a roguelike campaign that is unique on each playthrough.

name: Escape From Lesco
description: Escape From Lesco is a horror/puzzle adventure, where you must survive through your night shift, navigating through various puzzles and obstacles within the store, in order to find a way to escape...

name: Choice Matters
description: A resource management card game where every decision impacts your journey. Navigate diverse events, balance resources, and uncover unique stories.

name: Neon Fever
description: Jump, slide and shoot! Kill a player or wipe the entire enemy team with your one-shot-no-scope-super-laser-aiming skills and use gadgets to your advantage, in a 5v5 arena shooter with dynamic game modes and fast paced movement mechanics. May the better team win!

name: No Paint No Gain
description: They say that without pain, there is no gain... But in this game, if you don't paint you don't gain! Choose the color or material you want and decorate the train stations as you want. Before start painting you must clean the station to earn money and buy some materials... So don't pain

name: Cast Cats
description: Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you.

name: Last Half of Darkness
description: Your aunt sure was a strange one. She was some sort of witch or something. A good witch though, practicing only good spells and magic. In fact, she was working on a potion just before she was killed. Now the secret will go to the grave with her... unless you can find the missing ingredients.

name: Castleyard
description: Step into the role of a medieval Lord in Castleyard, a captivating castle management game where your strategic decisions shape the fate of your realm. Manage resources, train knights, and navigate the intricate politics of your court to lead your people to prosperity.

name: Typing Test
description: TypingTest – Fast and Exciting Typing Challenge Where speed and accuracy meet fun! Play solo or multiplayer, improve your typing skills, and compete with friends. Available in 13 languages with detailed stats to track your progress. Join the TypingTest community and become a typing master!

name: Cat Fusion Quest
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Cat Fusion Quest, a delightful and addictive puzzle game where the goal is to combine adorable cats to create even more charming and powerful feline friends!

name: Neo Harbor Rescue Squad
description: Live the life of a rookie paramedic through frantic minigame action and a wild, funny story. Juggle waves of patients with a battle-like triage system; master dozens of treatment minigames; and win the city's recognition from the rival fire department!

name: Peach Clicker
description: You've clicked on so many bananas, but have you clicked on peaches? In Peach Clicker you smack a Peach to get even more Peaches! Every hour, you get a new peach! Come smack some peaches with us!

name: Hallowanderband
description: Hallowanderband is a casual rhythm game focusing on Halloween-themed stories animated in a cartoon style. Join the miracle journey of the Hallow Wanderband!

name: Destroy All Letters
description: Destroy All Letters is a challenging game where you practice typing. Each time you type, your goal is to hit and destroy as many letters as possible without looking at the keyboard. Improve your typing skills by solving speed and accuracy challenges to achieve the best result.

name: Touko in Underland
description:
Touko In Underland is an exploratory horror game with a focus on beautiful and atmospheric environments.

Break the loop in a seemingly endless labyrinth that has trapped Touko with her unhinged stalker.

name: Domus Abscondita
description: Domus Abscondita is single player horror and mystery adventure. Step into the shoes of a private investigator and try to uncover all the secrets of the Manor. Will you escape with the truth, or will you become another lost soul within its haunted halls?

name: MK-Ultra Tower Defense
description: Smite demonic entities with the higher dimensional frequency of your Kundalini energy spiral in this esoteric Tower Defense Roguelike. Expand your consciousness in the fourth dimension and receive the help of higher dimensional entities in order to access the Akashic records.

name: Escape of The Hammer Princess
description: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! After years of waiting to be rescued, the Princess has decided to rescue herself. Escape as the princess in exciting retro-styled 3D, and relive the deaths of her would-be rescuers in classic 8-bit 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!

name: Man Made
description: Man Made is an massive open world simulator that will challenge your skills in all aspects. Build, hunt, fish, plant and do various jobs for the residents.It's up to you how you earn and spend your money.

name: Geometry Shooter
description: Geometry shooter is an arcade game that is simple to start but hard to master - shoot the cannon to break objects in the screen, but beware - each ball you shoot will expand into a new object!

name: Pixel Pixie
description: A Vorpal Knight with twisted ambitions has kidnapped the last Pixies to drain their power! Replace your weak starting party with stronger heroes, find useful items and game-changing relics, and assemble a formidable rescue team in this roguelike auto-battler, a love letter to the 8-bit RPGs of yore.

name: Piece Shogi
description: A turn-based strategy game with unique rules added to Shogi. New and various strategies are created by the special effect pieces.

name: Madness Inside
description: "Madness Inside"" immerses you in the dark depths of an abandoned psychiatric hospital, where horrifying experiments were once conducted. Police Lieutenant Vic Voight, in pursuit of a dangerous criminal, unexpectedly finds himself trapped in this nightmarish place.

name: Reign of Cats
description: Reign of Cats - Take control of a cat and explore the neighborhood to complete a variety of missions in this casual RPG.

name: Elementia
description: Elementia is a tower defense game set in a fantasy world where nations with internal conflicts suddenly form an alliance against a common enemy. Players will develop strategies to defend their homelands against this unpredictable foe as they progress through the territories of the nations.

name: Arch Legends
description: Arch Legends is a classic RPG full of stories and maps to explore, focused on hunting for treasure and killing monsters. Build your own hero by challenging your limits and join thousands of players on this journey into a dark fantasy world. No micro-transactions! No cash shop!

name: Crossed Commands: Collision
description: Crossed Command: Collision is a 2D pixel-art strategy game. You take charge of mighty mechs to defeat formidable foes, gathering new parts to assemble your own mechs and face even tougher enemies.

name: Dungeons & Kingdoms
description: A medieval fantasy kingdom builder, management sim and dungeon delver RPG hybrid. Gather resources, hunt wild animals and build infrastructure. Then dive into the dungeons to face the monsters within. Reap the rewards, unlock new resources and advance your tech.

name: Refugees: Shelter
description: Players will take on the role of an ordinary citizen living under the shadow of war. With no end in sight and resources becoming scarce, you must venture out daily to find supplies. While scavenging, you must always be on guard against threats from criminals and deserters...

name: The Simp
description: A horror decryption game. The player needs to carefully observe the interactive items in the scene and deduce how to crack them. Time to test courage and patience!

name: Infiltrate & Extract
description: A top-down 3D stealth game where remaining undetected is of utmost priority. Take down security guards and stay in the shadows to reach the vault and extract a highly valuable relic.

name: Heart of Squid
description: Returning from vacation, he finds that the island has been invaded by workers who plan to cut down all the trees and blow up the island. Not agreeing with this decision, Grandpa decides to engage in an unequal battle to defend his home.

name: The Silence
description: Dive into the dark depths of an abandoned hospital in "The Silence", a thrilling single-player horror game. Alone and abandoned, you awaken in a gloomy corridor, surrounded by crumbling walls and an oppressive feeling of isolation. But the silence is deceptive because you are never truly alone. A sinister presence stalks you, watching your every move from the shadows.

name: Canto I
description: Face the Dark Forest of the Divine Comedy in this action platformer inspired by the Sommo Poeta’s masterpiece! Help Dante avoid pitfalls, spikes & specters using double jumps, magical attacks and dashes. Find the scrolls containing the triplets of the Canto exploring this gloomy, pixelart forest!

name: Streep
description: Streep invites you to a magical paper world where you, as a pen, hold the power to change everything. Draw lines to alter the environment, reveal hidden secrets, and protect against evildoers. Each decision shapes a unique adventure. What kind of world will you create?

name: Riddlewood Manor
description: Welcome to Riddlewood Manor, a delightfully spooky point & click horror adventure. On a mission to purify these haunted halls, you will solve puzzles, meet strange characters, and purge malevolent spirits. Uncover the dark history of the Riddlewoods, but first, you’ll have to survive a demonic doll.

name: Brothel Tycoon
description: Brothel Tycoon is a simulation game where you have to help Yvonne, in any way possible, including sex if necessary, to develop her business from a small cafe to a luxury entertainment place for adults.

name: Screech
description: In "Screech," play as Astrix, exploring The Academy's secrets. Use a compass to travel through time, solve puzzles, and uncover the past. Collect gears and shards to activate a machine that captures knowledge in a "Screech." Discover the mysteries in this captivating puzzle platformer.

name: CasualMuyu
description: Peace comes from nature and regularity Tap the screen to knock the "Muyu" and advance the time while enjoying the neglected daily nature, and you will find peace. Suitable for relieving anxiety and insomnia symptoms.

name: Samsara
description: Recovering memories and escaping hell 2D games of the main character, "The Dutiful Person," who is taken to hell with no memory while fighting with the Grim Reaper who drags her mother without knowing that her mother has ended her life This hell is set in seven hells. Will you ever escape hell?

name: Thank You For Your Application
description: Thank you for your application. After 15 rounds of interviews, you do not match our requirements for the position. You are transferred as a Junior Interviewer to review the candidate's resume according to the company's requirements and send appropriate thanks letters.

name: Gnomes
description: Deploy your gnomes, tend to your garden and prepare your defenses. Every day the map expands further into goblin territory, revealing new threats and resources. Earn gold, invest wisely and carefully combine your upgrades. Survive long enough and face the goblin king. No two runs are the same.

name: Take Me, Vitaly
description: In every woman's life, there comes a moment when she walks into the wrong door... The last thing I remember is a masquerade party at a nightclub and a tall, muscular man with a Belarusian accent who offered to buy me a cocktail...

name: The Enigma Cases
description: The Enigma Cases invites you to test your skills as a detective and solve the most complex cases. Join your friends in this immersive and mysterious world. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth?

name: Elve
description: Single player horror battle royal shooter

name: None Shall Intrude: Descent
description: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: Cathy and The Others
description: The sound of a pickup truck starting. A hammering headache. And this locked room. What happened to Cathy? Cathy And The Others offers a narrative experience where the player must escape a strange house.

name: Material Evidence
description: Clean up the streets in this hard-hitting action platformer! Enter a gritty saga of three complex individuals, each driven by their own motives and vices, their paths intersecting in unexpected and violent ways.

name: Eternal Bonds
description: Eternal Bonds is a challenging puzzle platformer where you switch between two characters to solve intricate puzzles. Can you and your unlikely duo escape the spaceship, or will you be stuck puzzling forever?

name: Barro 2024
description: Jumping is back!

name: Flan's MS
description: Flan's MS is a 2D story game with some puzzles and gameplay systems. After escaping from everything she is familiar with, Flan needs to retrieve her lost dream diary and find the answers she needs.

name: Croissant
description: Croissant is a clicker game, click the Croissant to gain even more Croissant! By spending time on the game, or by clicking on the Croissant, you can obtain skins. Collect them or trade them to expand your new collection.

name: Second Rate Superheroes
description: An addicting, chaotic, nerve-wracking action-roguelike in which you command 20 superhero former-rejects to protect yourself and the Mayor from tides of hell. With dozens of weapons, insane combos, 400+ upgrade "cards," your fingers will be sweating like you're wearing wool mittens in July.

name: Goodgame Gangster
description: In Goodgame Gangster you live the thrilling life of a gangster in a big city. Do missions for the godfather, duel with other players and get new items at the blackmarket to improve your character. Build up a clan and make it the greatest family in the city. Start your career and become the biggest gangster of all time.

name: Flash Tennis
description: The international Flash Tennis tournament has begun! Select your character and do your best to win the cup or challenge your friends in local multiplayer.

name: War of the Web
description:
2012 online multiplayer real-time strategy Flash game. Players are split into 5 teams depending on the website they were playing the game on, and they battle each other for the control of the map.

Every site wants to claim Mars for themselves, and all out war has broken out between New Geo (Newgrounds), Kong (Kongregate), Armora (Armor Games), F.A.C.E. (Facebook), and Jiggs!(Jiggmin) You and your fellow commanders from will have to band together if you hope to achieve victory --Build up cities, construct space-ships, and claim Mars!

name: Polyphony
description: A hybrid Standard/Kaizo Super Mario World ROMhack.

name: Super Mario Forever
description:
Super Mario Forever, also widely known as 'Super Mario Bros. Frustration', is a 'Kaizo Hack' of Super Mario Bros. made by a Japanese modder. It is notable for being one of the first extremely difficult Super Mario hacks to be created.

This is the game that is played in the popular video "Super Mario Brothers - Frustration" on YouTube.

name: True Blood: The Karthanian Ultimatum
description: A basic 'arcade flight' game made by MVP Software. It was commonly found on old MS-DOS shareware collections and shovel-ware compilations. Has probably one of the most ridiculous intro videos of it's time.

name: The Flames
description:
The old magician went in search of new knowledge. There has been no news from him for a long time. His student goes in search of her teacher. The path lies through distant lands and ancient ruins. The sorceress will have to break through hordes of enemies, solve riddles with the help of clues and find her teacher.

The player is controlled around the world. Destroys mobs, collects loot, demonstrates objects (eg a bomb), opens new locations. Saving occurs at individual points (obelisk). When revived, the player revives everything else.

name: Roll
description: Relax as you explore an infinite world of thought and beauty in this 2D ball-rolling game. Collect stories, discover secrets, and upgrade your abilities to traverse further, all while listening to procedurally generated music that responds to your journey.

name: MultiHero
description: MultiHero is a 2D fighter puzzle platformer inspired by super smash bros.

name: Yumtree
description:
How savvy are your spending habits? Can you tell a great bargain from a pointlessly pricey purchase?

Well, don’t worry if you can’t spot the difference – we've got the perfect game to get you trained to pick up the best bargains (especially if they’re sausage-based!)

Want to know how to perfect your purchasing powers? All you have to do is:

Buy and sell sausages to get enough money to decorate Gnasher’s kennel!

When you are low on money or sausgages, you will be given the chance to end the biding or selling early

Buy cheap and sell high to make a profit! It's a banger.

So, there you go! Just click Tap To Play and you’ll be richer than Jeff Bezos* in no time!

*Only if you count Jeff Bezos’s fortune in sausages that is, which, let's be honest, he probably does...

name: Bananaman: Food Fighter
description:
Peel the power in this week's exciting adventure, where our hero Bananaman takes on all his foes at once! (Well, more like one by one in hand to hand combat.) Will you take control of our potassium-powered hero, to beat back the baddies? OR will you play as one of Beanotown's villains?

Happy Birthday to Bananaman, Beanotown's very own food-based defender. But when the big blue guy's birthday celebrations get going, things rapidly go wrong. It's veritable villainy as Beanotown is under attack from a cake full of baddies.

Rotten to the core, the evil Appleman is here - but can Bananaman take a bite out of crime?

From outer space, King Zorg thinks this is (once again) the perfect time to take over Earth - can Bananaman send them back to space?

Things blow up when Bubblegum Bert pops onto the scene - can Bananaman burst his bubble?

Captain Cream comes to cause chaos - but can Bananaman make him cry over spilt milk?

The Heavy Mob are here for havoc - but can our hero give them the heave-ho?

The Mole might be making a move - but will Bananaman bury his criminal ambitions?

Things spell doom when Doctor Gloom appears with General Blight - but will Bananaman do what he can and try to win the fight?

Finally, namananaB from Gloom's magic mirror makes an appearance - but is he here to help or harm our hectic hero?

Mark the 40th Anniversary of Bananaman with this retro fighting game where YOU can have fun fisticuffs fighting a few of your favourite mischief makers. Meet Eric, the schoolboy who leads an exciting double life. For when Eric eats a banana, an amazing transformation occurs. Eric is Bananaman! From his first appearance in the Nutty comic in 1980, to his time living in Dandyville, the blue and yellow hero is now Beanotown's best (but not their brightest) hope against defeating evil

name: Escape from Bash Street School!
description:
Join Scotty, Danny, Toots, Sidney, Plug, Freddy, ‘Erbert, Wilfrid and Smiffy on a mission that seems almost impossible; to escape from the most notorious school in the country.

When the Bash Street Kids discover a mysterious old door in the basement of Bash Street School, they just have to explore! But, as they wander deeper and deeper into the maze of tunnels below, they start to think maybe it wasn’t such a good idea.

- Click anywhere on the screen to jump and tap twice to double jump!

- Dodge enemies, avoid spikes, and find the key to help the kids get back to class

- How did you score? Check the report card on the main menu to get your grade!

name: Attack on Survey Cops
description: Attack on Survey Corps is a visual novel set in a world inspired by the anime/manga Attack on Titan.

name: Of Potions and Spells
description: In this game, you play as a newcomer to the Fairy Tail guild. Being a hentai protagonist, you of course wish to build a harem of the girls of the guild. Soon enough, you find a shop with magic potions and items that will do that and more.

name: Hexdo
description: Ever wanted to be a light and purify the world from evil spirits? Well, I hope you already are, but if not, you can play as one! Hexdo is a simple puzzle game. There is no score, no quests, no save games, you can just play through an endless stream of levels while listening to relaxing music.

name: Blow Out
description: Blow Out is a "non-violent" arcade game where you can't kill your enemies, you can only blow them back! It's very fun.

name: Keep it Up
description: A thrilling rock climbing puzzle action game with simple click challenges

name: Undead At Dawn
description: Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to hordes of thousands of zombies, in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world invasion.

name: Stack 'Em Up
